page.title: 09Childrens Leisure Clothes.
page.content: {Boys Leisure Clothes( by Daniel.) When I relax I like to wear a red jumper that has long sleeves and goes down to my waist.It has a mock zip in the top left hand corner.It is made of velour.Underneath my jumper I wear a plain blue t-shirt with pockets on each side.It has buttons and is made of cotton.I have got some blue jeans that reach down to my ankles,and I like to wear training shoes. {Girls Leisure Clothes( by Laura.) { Sometimes I wear my jump-suit that is pink.At the top it's got three buttons on the left hand side that are pink,and you can do it up on any button.At the bottom it is pink as well and it has a pocket on each side.I wear white ankle socks and plastic shoes.They have got a bit of a heel.My jump suit is made of cotton.
